alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 28 at 1:09PM MST until January 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 15 below to 5 below zero. * WHERE...Clark Fork, Sandpoint, Hayden, Lookout Pass, Post Falls, Athol, Eastport, Priest River, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Coeur d`Alene, Mullan, Dobson Pass, Fernwood, Worley, Wallace, Bonners Ferry, Pinehurst, Osburn, Fourth Of July Pass, Kellogg, and St. Maries. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle
